column1: 17 year old. Never had a date.
Music Management Major with no will to live so have at it
Chemicals in the water turned this frog gay
Roast this girl with dreams as high as the mountains she hikes
19 yo medical student, stacked stud, unroastable.
Make me cry. I enjoy it.
My only social media is LinkedIn. Roast Me.
She was excited, make her regret it
Roast this supreme wearing, fat, no-souled ginger headass
In grad school, live with my girlfriend, basically on cloud 9, bring me down a couple of pegs.
[19M] Roast my friend, makes us laugh
This is my friend who got kicked out of art school for smoking weed and skipping class. Now he says delivering pizza is his new art form.
